channel.title: Error connecting to server after 4 players join
channel.description: i searched through a lot of posts,and cant find anything helping to a solution,OK well here is the story,Ive recently started a server,and whenever 4 players log on,it wont let anybody else in,it will keep saying 'error connecting to server' but i know its not down because i have players on it already,and it wouldn't be a real problem if it were at like 20 when it stopped since its a new server,but Ive recently gotten more players to play frequently,so i really wanna fix this problem,any suggestions,Ive already checked max players its set at 200,but it wont allow anymore players in. and i read somewhere it might be my RAM but my friend said it probably isn't that but im not sure,so any help would be appreciated,thank you in advance.

cloudscape:

KK, have fun

thanks but i decided against it and im just gonna use ragescape’s source,it looks really nice,can i get a woot woot for a closed thread? thanks

item.title: Error connecting to server after 4 players join
item.dc:creator: @twinkie254 twinkie254
item.description:
@twinkie254 wrote:

oh no thats all fine,it starts up fine,its just when the server is running with people in it (its always 4 people) its like maxplayers is set at 4 but i know its not,ive checked and saved it a thousand times.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2008, 08:05:09 pm[/size][hr][quote=“FusionLord, post:5, topic:250379”]I have the same problem and I am running Vista Black Edition 2009,have 2Gb of RAM, have a Intel® Celeron® D CPU 3.33GHz 3.33Ghz. any ideas for me?[/quote]

what source do you use?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server after 4 players join
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you get an error in your runserver.bat, then there is a problem. If you do, paste it on here and we can take a look.

Read full topic
item.source: Error connecting to server after 4 players join

item.title: Error connecting to server after 4 players join
item.dc:creator: @twinkie254 twinkie254
item.description:
@twinkie254 wrote:

search in server.java for maxplayers or max or something like that and change the number,

i already stated that i knew it wasnt maxplayers,but thanks for your input and trying to help.

[quote=“chassy13, post:8, topic:250379”][quote author=RSC_n33b link=topic=330205.msg2579977#msg2579977 date=1229216260]
search in server.java for maxplayers or max or something like that
and change the number,
[/quote]

Read please?

Your server may reject people after 4, do you get a really long error when it disconnects?[/quote]

do you mean if im in game,and it disconnects (thats not whats happening,the server is up but no more than 4 people can get on at a time,its like the ‘login’ per se goes down)

or do you mean when i press ‘enter’ do i get a long error,then yes i do.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2008, 07:50:34 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
